message.screenshot_uploader.no_return_ur: Screenshot upload failed: The server did not return valid URLs.
message.screenshot_uploader.open_game_ga: Open the screenshot in your ingame gallery
message.screenshot_uploader.open_website: Open the screenshot in your browser
message.screenshot_uploader.copy_url: Copy the url of the screenshot
message.screenshot_uploader.share_screen: Share the url of the screenshot in the chat
message.screenshot_uploader.shared_saved: You have saved this Gallery: Click Here to open the screenshot
message.screenshot_uploader.shared: Click Here to open the screenshot
message.screenshot_uploader.next_upload: Next screenshots will be uploaded to [%s]
message.screenshot_uploader.next_upload_: Your screenshots will be uploaded to this server, you can see those screenshots at [ %s ] or in your ingame Gallery(press [%s])
Your screenshots will be uploaded to [%s](%s), you can see those screenshots at [%s] or in your ingame Gallery(press [%s])
message.screenshot_uploader.error.reason: The server could not be reached. What to do: Make sure the server is online and the address is correct.
The connection to the server took too long. What to do: Check your internet connection and try again. You may also need to increase the timeout settings.
The server address could not be found. What to do: Ensure the address is correct and the server is running.
The server could not process the request due to an invalid syntax. What to do: Verify the request parameters, headers, and payload are correct.
Access to the server was denied. What to do: Ensure you have the correct authentication credentials.
You do not have permission to access the resource on the server. What to do: Check your user permissions or contact the server administrator.
The requested resource could not be found on the server. What to do: Verify the endpoint URL is correct.
The server encountered an internal error while processing the request. What to do: Contact the server administrator or try again later.
The server is currently unable to handle the request. What to do: The server might be down for maintenance or overloaded. Try again later.
The connection timed out while communicating with the server. What to do: Check your internet connection, and consider increasing the timeout duration.
The server's hostname could not be resolved. What to do: Check the URL or hostname for typos and ensure DNS resolution is working.
The connection was abruptly terminated while reading/writing. What to do: This can occur if the server closes the connection unexpectedly. Retry the request or check the server logs.
There was an SSL/TLS handshake failure. What to do: Ensure the server uses a valid SSL certificate. If you're using a self-signed certificate, import it into the Java keystore.
There was an error in the HTTP protocol used for communication. What to do: Ensure the HTTP request is formatted correctly, including headers and body.
The specified file to upload was not found. What to do: Double-check the file path and ensure the file exists.

An I/O error occurred while writing to the server. What to do: This could be caused by a network issue, file access problem, or server disconnection. Verify the file path, server status, and network connection.
The specified local port is already in use. What to do: Check if another application is using the port and configure a different one if needed.
The HTTP client timed out waiting for a response from the server. What to do: Increase the timeout settings and verify that the server is responsive.
The system ran out of memory while processing the file. What to do: Ensure the file size is manageable or increase the JVM heap size using `-Xmx`.
The request contained invalid parameters. What to do: Double-check the request body, headers, and parameters for correctness.
The URL provided is malformed or invalid. What to do: Double-check the URL structure and ensure it starts with 'http://' or 'https://'.
Error writing to server. What to do: Check if the server is available and ensure there are no network issues.
An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later or contact support with the error details.
gui.screenshot_uploader.config.title: Config
gui.screenshot_uploader.config.nothing_c: Nothing changed. No need to save
gui.screenshot_uploader.config.unsaved_d: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to discard them?
gui.screenshot_uploader.editor.title: Image Editor
You need to wax the sign in order to open the screenshot
gui.screenshot_uploader.screenshot_scree: Failed to load image. Please check the URL or your internet connection
config.screenshot_uploader.enable_mod: Determines if the mod should be enabled
config.screenshot_uploader.upload_screen: Toggle screenshot uploads to the specified upload_urls
config.screenshot_uploader.upload_urls: List with server name and the server data (upload, gallery, home)
config.screenshot_uploader.require_no_hu: Only send screenshots if the HUD is hidden (F1)
config.screenshot_uploader.limit_to_serv: Only upload screenshot while playing on the server specified in limitedServerAddr
config.screenshot_uploader.limited_serve: The server address to which the upload should be limited to
config.screenshot_uploader.send_world_da: Enable sending of world data with the screenshot upload
config.screenshot_uploader.send_system_i: Enable sending of system information with the screenshot upload
config.screenshot_uploader.share_text: Text format for sharing the screenshot link (placeholders like {sharedLink} are allowed)
config.screenshot_uploader.images_per_ro: Number of images per row when displaying screenshots in the gallery
config.screenshot_uploader.image_gap: Spacing between images in the gallery
config.screenshot_uploader.image_top_pad: Top padding for images in the gallery
config.screenshot_uploader.edit_image_fi: File path format for edited images (use {fileName} as placeholder)
config.screenshot_uploader.highlight_scr: Highlight screenshot signs where a player has placed a sign with a link to a screenshot
config.screenshot_uploader.hide_sign: Hide the sign after the screenshot link has been placed on it
config.screenshot_uploader.use_custom_si: Use a custom sign design instead of the default sign for linking screenshots
config.screenshot_uploader.highlight_osc: Highlight any oscillating objects in the screenshots for emphasis
config.screenshot_uploader.rotate_highli: Rotate the highlighted sign in the screenshot to make it more noticeable
Rotate the highlighted item in the screenshot to make it stand out
config.screenshot_uploader.highlight_ite: The item type (e.g., painting) to highlight in the screenshot when placed on a sign
config.screenshot_uploader.highlight_col: Alpha value for the highlight color (transparency level) for the sign/item highlight
Red color component for the highlight color applied to signs/items
Green color component for the highlight color applied to signs/items
Blue color component for the highlight color applied to signs/items
config.screenshot_uploader.highlight_rot: Speed of the highlight rotation (applies to sign/item rotation)
